title: New champ concept
body:
Highly mobile tank/assassin hybrid

Not sure about damage and theme but the passive should be sustain/max hp% true damage
E should be mobility, dash or speed
R Should be immunity from cc or damage or both or just CC enemy
Q should be cc/offensive stat
W should be heal/damage


This champ would be really healthy, good gameplay and provide lots of counterplay.

replies.body: you just described Tank build Nami, lol.{{champion:267}}
